hero.title: Welcome to
hero.subtitle: Organize your clinic easily... and save your time for patients, not paperwork
hero.doctor_message: If you are a doctor: Easy platform to manage your work - You will earn a lot with us

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about TabibiQ platform and how we help you in your health journey
about.description: TabibiQ is a leading medical platform in Iraq, aiming to facilitate communication between patients, doctors, and medical centers. We believe that healthcare should be easy and accessible to everyone.

security.title: Complete Security
security.description: Your data is protected and encrypted with the latest technologies

speed.title: Fast Booking
speed.description: Book your appointment in less than a minute

verified.title: Verified Doctors
verified.description: All doctors are reviewed and verified

easy_use.title: Easy to Use
easy_use.description: Simple and easy interface for everyone

how_to_use.title: How to Use
how_to_use.subtitle: Simple steps to book your appointment with a doctor

step1.title: Choose Doctor
step1.description: Search for the right doctor by specialty and location

step2.title: Select Appointment
step2.description: Choose the date and time that suits you

step4.title: Receive Confirmation
step4.description: You will receive a confirmation message

booking.title: Booking Instructions
booking.subtitle: Important tips before booking your appointment

data_accuracy.title: Ensure Data Accuracy
data_accuracy.description: Enter your personal information accurately to avoid any problems

temporary.title: Temporary Booking
temporary.description: Booking is temporary until confirmed by the doctor within 24 hours

communication.title: Contact Doctor
communication.description: You can communicate directly with the doctor through the platform

cancellation.title: Cancellation Option
cancellation.description: You can cancel the appointment 24 hours before the appointment

doctor_services.title: Our Services for Doctors
doctor_services.subtitle: Comprehensive platform for clinic and patient management - Join us today!

dashboard.title: Comprehensive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage all appointments and patients from one place with an easy-to-use interface - Save your time and energy!

calendar.title: Smart Calendar
calendar.description: View and manage appointments in calendar format with filtering and search capabilities - Organize your work smartly!

analytics.title: Analytics & Statistics
analytics.description: Detailed statistics about appointments, patients, and overall clinic performance - Make informed decisions!

profile.title: Profile Management
profile.description: Update clinic information, specialty, and personal photos - Present yourself in the best way!

special_appointments.title: Special Appointments
special_appointments.description: Add and manage special appointments with the ability to add notes - Provide personalized care!

notifications.title: Notification System
notifications.description: Real-time notifications for new appointments and important updates - Stay informed always!

images.title: Image Management
images.description: Upload and update personal photos and clinic images easily - Make your clinic stand out!

location.title: Location Setting
location.description: Add clinic location on the map to facilitate patient access - Help patients find you easily!

health_centers.title: Health Centers Management
health_centers.description: Connect clinics with health centers and manage relationships - Expand your network!

patient_management.title: Patient Management
patient_management.description: Comprehensive medical record for each patient with appointment history and notes - Provide integrated care!

revenue_tracking.title: Revenue Tracking
revenue_tracking.description: Detailed statistics about revenue and profits with monthly reports - Grow your business!

online_consultations.title: Online Consultations
online_consultations.description: Ability to provide remote medical consultations - Expand your practice!

marketing_tools.title: Marketing Tools
marketing_tools.description: Featured display on the platform with view statistics - Attract more patients!

benefits.title: Why Should You Join Us, Doctor?
benefits.subtitle: Exclusive benefits for member doctors

free_registration.title: Free Registration
free_registration.description: Join for free and enjoy all benefits

increased_visibility.title: Increased Visibility
increased_visibility.description: Get featured display in search results

patient_management.title: Patient Management
patient_management.description: Comprehensive tool for managing patient records and appointments

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed statistics to improve your practice

support.title: 24/7 Technical Support
support.description: Specialized support team to help you always

growth.title: Grow Your Practice
growth.description: Expand your patient base and increase your revenue
